column1: 341111,Railway Signal Electrician,,"Clean or repair equipment, parts or tools
column5: Drive vehicles to, or at, work sites
column7: Inspect equipment to locate or identify electrical problems
column9: Inspect locomotives or other railway equipment
column11: Inspect mechanical equipment to locate damage, defects or wear
column13: Lubricate equipment to allow proper functioning
column15: Maintain locomotives or other rail equipment in good working condition
column19: Monitor surroundings to detect potential hazards
column21: Record information about parts, materials or repair procedures
column23: Repair worn, damaged, or defective mechanical parts
column25: Replace worn, damaged or defective mechanical parts
column27: Test electrical circuits or components for proper functioning
column29: Test mechanical equipment to ensure proper functioning",nan
